text: Self Portrait is a self-portrait by Tintoretto, dating to around 1588. It was bought for Marie Antoinette with the chateau de Saint-Cloud in 1785. It is now in the Louvre. ==External links== *Louvre: Self Portrait by Tintoretto Category:Paintings by Tintoretto Tintoretto Tintoretto category:1588 paintings Tintoretto Category:Mannerist paintings Tintoretto Tintoretto Category:Paintings of the Louvre by Italian artists category:Portrait paintings of the Louvre
title: Self Portrait (Tintoretto)
